Title: It Smells of Books
Plot: Brian finds the library card of cold case victim Dr Richard Symes, leading him to reinvestigate the death of the professor, who died after falling from the roof of his college three years previously. Sandra and Gerry interview Symes' widow, who believes principal Jeremy Ventham drove her husband to suicide following a conflict over teaching methods.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
